post.description:
To add a bank account for a provider we have to create a bank token which in return will give us a bank_token which will be required in the Add Provider's bank account API

Now there would be 2 types of accounts  Individual and Company. If we are adding bank details for Individual then we have to select individual from dropdown list next to account_type and in case we are adding bank details for Company then we have to select company.

    For testing purpose we can use following details-

    account_number: 000123456789
    rounting_number: 110000000

total.description: Total payable amount every month (Without Late Fees)

full_amount_disabled_reason.description: Reason for which Payment Processor has been disabled.

plan_disabled_reason.description: Reason for which Plans are disabled.

post.description:
In this API, we are clubbing Payment Processing and Contract generation APIs this means we can use this single API to either Pay full Amount (Payment Processing) or Pay Per Month (Finance a customer). We will provider the customer details along with the details required to finance a customer like service amount, down payment, number of payments, etc.

In response we will get the payment_link which will be used for the payment. We need to open the payment_link in a browser where we will get the option to pay. If a customer wants to pay now then we have the option to Pay Full Now and if he wants to finance then we can select another option Pay Per Month.

    For payment we can use the Testing cards:
    4000002500003155    Valid Thru: 12/25     Any 3 digits(CVV) - 3D secure card
    4242424242424242	Valid Thru: 12/25      Any 3 digits(CVV) - Successful payment
    4000000000000341    Valid Thru: 12/25     Any 3 digits(CVV) - Attempt to charge will fail
    
Note: Possible values for interest_rate_type is 1 (Compound Interest) , 2 (Flat Interest)

service_amount.description: Total amount to be financed. Financed amount + Down payment amount will be used as total service amount if customer chooses to pay now.

downpayment_amount.description: This amount will be taken as down payment if customer makes a contract. Financed amount + Down payment amount will be used as total service amount if customer chooses to pay now.

number_of_payments.description: Total number of payments option to be provided to customer for a contract.

start_date.description: First payment will be deducted on this date if customer makes a contract. Format should be "YYYY-MM-DD". Should be a future date.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the customer. Format should be "YYYY-MM-DD".

service_array.description: This is an array which requires the details of the service provided with the price. This field will be required soon.

post.summary: Provide customer details for the Payment

full_amount_disabled_reason.description: Reason for which Payment Processor has been disabled.

post.description:
We have a customer who wants to pay full amount now then we will use this API. Just enter the customer details and amount. 

In response we will get a payment_link which will be used for the payment. We need to open the payment_link in a browser where we will get the option to pay.

    For payment we can use the Testing cards:
    4000002500003155    Valid Thru: 12/25     Any 3 digits(CVV) - 3D secure card
    4000000000000341    Valid Thru: 12/25     Any 3 digits(CVV) - Attempt to charge will fail 

Once the payment has been done and we can verify in the List of Payments of a provider API.

service_amount.description: Total amount to be financed. Financed amount + Down payment amount will be used as total service amount if customer chooses to pay now.

service_array.description: This is an array which requires the details of the service provided with the price. This field will be required soon.

post.summary: Provide customer details for the Contract

total.description: Total payable amount every month (Without Late Fees)

plan_disabled_reason.description: Reason for which Plans are disabled.

post.description:
We have created our account and now we want to finance a customer. To finance a customer we need to create a contract. This API will be used for providing the details to be used in creating a contract. 

In response we will get a payment_link which will be used for the payment. We need to open the payment_link in a browser where we will get the option to pay.

    For payment we can use the Testing cards:
    4242424242424242	Valid Thru: 12/25      Any 3 digits(CVV) - Successful payment
    4000000000000341    Valid Thru: 12/25     Any 3 digits(CVV) - Attempt to charge will fail

We can verify that a contract is created or not from the List of contracts of a provider API.

Note: Possible values for interest_rate_type is 1 (Compound Interest) , 2 (Flat Interest)

service_amount.description: Total amount to be financed. Financed amount + Down payment amount will be used as total service amount if customer chooses to pay now.

downpayment_amount.description: This amount will be taken as down payment if customer makes a contract. Financed amount + Down payment amount will be used as total service amount if customer chooses to pay now.

number_of_payments.description: Total number of payments option to be provided to customer for a contract.

start_date.description: First payment will be deducted on this date if customer makes a contract. Format should be "YYYY-MM-DD". Should be a future date.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the customer. Format should be "YYYY-MM-DD".

service_array.description: This is an array which requires the details of the service provided with the price. This field will be required soon.

data.message: This finance token is not used yet
Payment failed with error message 'Your card has expired.'

post.summary: Select a Plan using customer ID
post.description:
In this API we will be selecting the plan and providing the customers details with customer ID.

We will use the plan_id which we got from the response of the List of plan API.
start_date will be the date from when we want the contract to start (first recurring amount payment date).
service_array is the breakdown of the services taken by the customer and it is optional.

In the response we will get the finance_token which will be used in Pay for Contract API.
